page.title: 08School Life.
page.content: We are in the sixth form at Swinton Comprehensive School. We have a wide choice of subjects here such as physics and maths to english and art. As well as lessons we have approximately four hours of private study in which to do homework and preparation for lessons. In between lessons there is a fifteen minute break and an hour for lunch. The school day lasts about six and a half hours. The sixth form also holds many social events throughout the year in the form of social evenings and parties. There are also many clubs within the school such as sports clubs and a computer club.
